text.text_translated:
A millennial is a person. They were born from 1983 to 1993.
PwC is a company. They did a survey around the world. More than 40,000 people answered. Some were millennials. Some were not.
The survey asked about how people act at work. It asked about how people talk at work. It asked about how people like to work. It asked about how people get paid. It asked about how people can get better jobs. It asked about time for work and time for life.

Deloitte is another company. They did another survey around the world. More than 10,000 millennials answered.
This survey asked what millennials think about work. It asked about problems and chances for work. The world of work is not simple.
